summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to funding available for responding to domestic violence; authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Justice for financial assistance in the amount of Two Million Three Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($2,375,000) to fund the operation of a comprehensive set of programs and policies to enhance mandatory arrest policies for domestic violence crimes and enhance coordinated community response to domestic violence; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1998 budgets of the Department of Housing and Human Services (DHHS) and the Police Department (SPD); making reimbursable appropriations; creating and authorizing the filling of certain positions in DHHS and SPD; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
